body.p: This subpart implements the requirements of the Helium Act (50 U.S.C.167, etseq.) concerning the acquisition of liquid or gaseous helium by Federal agencies or by Government contractors or subcontractors for use in the performance of a Government contract (also see 43 CFR Part3195).
